Blog.post: Well, i havent posted in a while. I really havent felt like it or ive forgot. Todays wednesday so guess what? nothing. nothing good. so, i'll ttyl8r folks. bye.

Hola dudes! It's wednesday. and that means!... nothing. So bigballers, i am still working on my website. I have it at about 60% done. and nothing new happened 2day. evne thought school started late, who cares? wow a whole 1hr 40minutes. l8r.

I love random things.My life is random. (Well mostly). I don't know what's gonna happen in 5 seconds. It's all good. What shall i do 2morrow... hmmm. I have no f-cking clue. savory? See, that's random. Just like the title. Duh! Nothing new i can tell u homies about my website so pack it. And i know my g/f and one of my friends reads this so i gotta have some control to it. And if i dont? (uhh... not going there). Mmm! food! haha!

Nothing new has really happened today but I guess i could be wrong. I was debating with myself about the difference between XM Radio (the satellite crap), and the regular AM/FM radio. Personally, I like AM/FM radio better. Why? it only costs as much as the radio u buy. 5 bucks can get you unlimited radio. XM... sh-t, costs and fees up the ass. So what if it's commercial free? Who cares? Commercials on normal radio keep the station alive and gives money to the station to improve their stuff. Like for example, a local station here, KFNK, FunkyMonkey 104.9FM, they play about 6 minutes of commercials once every hour. why? because they have money from their commercials to do that. Just because XM is crystal clear stuff, the added static (in certain spots) of some stations adds to the fun of it. Who really wants 100 channels of PURE, CRISP crap when if you wanted sports and weather, you can watch the d-mn TV? It costs just as much to have an XM service from XMStaelliteRadio, Delphi, or Sirius, as it would to have satellite TV. wtf? Comment on it if you want. I just think XM radio is stupid.

I dont got much going on this week except for the usual. Staurday, i'm going to a local park with my g/f. Who knows what we're going 2 do. There aint much 2 do. Other than that, i dont know what im gonna do this week. school starts at a later time on wednesday but thats no big deal. tuesday, my little brother has his little league baseball game, friday her has a practice. i might take marissa to a movie in the next few weeks or so. im thinking about it. im not in the best shape health wise but im getting better. see ya all l8r.

I am bored. I couldn't go over to my girlfriend's house today because my mom wasn't letting me. And,my mom said no to the sleepover thing. It's ok. I am working on my website now. It should be up soon. Later.

I can't sleep. dont know why. I cant call my girlfriend, shes in bed. which reminds me... im going over there 2morrow and i might have a sleepover at her house. F-ck you. get those thoughts out of your head asshole. she hasen't asked yet and neither have I. I doubt that both our moms will say yes. But who cares? it's the thought that counts. even if i dont get 2 go, i c her a lot during the day. i walk her home after school, etc. etc. etc. peace out. when i get my website up, ill tell u about it. K? -john

Not much has happened today. I went to a couple of furniture stores, went to the comcast store and watched spanish soccer on FSN-Enspanol and took a nap when I got home. My day was ACTION PACKED! Yay. l8r.
